trans-unit.source: Provides the <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class for a collection of associated <xref:System.String> keys and <xref:System.Object> values that can be accessed either with the key or with the index.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref>基底類別的集合相關聯<xref:System.String>索引鍵和<xref:System.Object>可以存取具有索引鍵或索引的值。</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The underlying structure for this class is a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的基礎結構是雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: Each element is a key/value pair.
trans-unit.target: 每個項目是索引鍵/值組。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a NameObjectCollectionBase is the number of elements the NameObjectCollectionBase can hold.
trans-unit.target: NameObjectCollectionBase 的容量是 NameObjectCollectionBase 可以保存的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a NameObjectCollectionBase, the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation.
trans-unit.target: 當項目加入至 NameObjectCollectionBase 時，會自動增加容量視需要透過重新配置。

trans-unit.source: The hash code provider dispenses hash codes for keys in the NameObjectCollectionBase instance.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊碼提供者在該 NameObjectCollectionBase 執行個體中的索引鍵的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The default hash code provider is the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 預設雜湊碼提供者是<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>.</xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>

trans-unit.source: The comparer determines whether two keys are equal.
trans-unit.target: 比較子判斷兩個索引鍵是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The default comparer is the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>.
trans-unit.target: 預設比較子是<xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>.</xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>

trans-unit.source: In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.0 版，這個類別會使用區分文化特性的字串比較。

trans-unit.source: However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> when comparing strings.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在.NET Framework 1.1 和更新版本中，這個類別會使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>比較字串時。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需文化特性如何影響比較和排序的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行不區分文化特性的字串作業](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: `null` is allowed as a key or as a value.
trans-unit.target: `null`允許做為索引鍵或值。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method does not distinguish between `null` which is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` which is returned because the value associated with the key is `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] ><xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>方法不會區分`null`傳回因為找不到指定的索引鍵和`null`因為索引鍵相關聯的值是傳回哪個`null`。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref> class that is empty.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>是空的類別。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>是項目數目，<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>可以保存。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 當項目加入至<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>，就會自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部的陣列。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以評估集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數個項目加入至<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>時調整大小作業

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 在連續項目，例如清單的集合中移除項的項目向上移動以佔用空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，會移動之項目的索引也會更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 這個問題不適用於集合的項目在概念上群組成 bucket，例如雜湊資料表。

trans-unit.source: The capacity is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> can store.
trans-unit.target: 容量則是項目數目，<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>可以儲存。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Count is the number of elements that are actually in the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 計數是實際<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>中的項目數目

trans-unit.source: The capacity is always greater than or equal to Count.
trans-unit.target: 容量永遠是大於或等於 Count。

trans-unit.source: If Count exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果計數超過容量加入項目時，容量會自動增加之前複製的舊項目並加入新項目後，重新配置內部的陣列。

trans-unit.source: This enumerator returns the keys of the collection as strings.
trans-unit.target: 這個列舉值傳回為字串集合的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each`在 Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用`foreach`建議，而不是直接管理 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但無法用於修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 此位置<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是未定義。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>前進的第一個元素之前讀取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>值集合的列舉值</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>會傳回相同的物件直到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>設定<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>下一個項目。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>超過集合的列舉值的結尾會位於集合中的最後一個元素之後和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值位於這個位置上，後續呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>也會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>是未定義。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>的第一個元素的集合，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>後面加上<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉程式會永久失效，且其行為未定義。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取因此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒的程序。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以鎖定在整個列舉過程的集合。

trans-unit.source: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓集合以便進行讀取和寫入的多重執行緒能夠存取，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: 是唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、 移除或修改項目。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 是唯讀的集合是唯讀的集合只具有可防止修改集合的包裝函式因此，如果基礎集合進行變更，唯讀的集合會反映這些變更。

trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否存取<xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase"></xref>物件為同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>物件未同步處理。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別可以提供的同步化的版本<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>在整個列舉過程的屬性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保衍生自其他物件的集合正常運作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase> object.
